name: Goblin Pyromancer
originalText:
When Goblin Pyromancer comes into play, all Goblins get +3/+0 until end of turn.
At end of turn, destroy all Goblins.

rulings.text: It only destroys goblins if it is on the battlefield at the end of turn.

text:
When Goblin Pyromancer enters the battlefield, Goblin creatures get +3/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of the end step, destroy all Goblins.
